## Learning outcome

This hands-on lesson was performed in class where **Prof Kam Tin Seong** went through the basics and mechanics of Shiny. A Shiny app with interactive features was deployed via Shinyapps.io at the end of the lesson.

The Shiny app can be viewed at [Pupils Exam Result Dashboard](https://isss608-dex.shinyapps.io/In-class_Ex06/).
